metadata.title: CVE-2022-48650 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:qla2xxx: Fix memory leak in __qlt_24xx_handle_abts() Commit 8f394da36a36("scsi: qla2xxx: Drop TARGET_SCF_LOOKUP_LUN_FROM_TAG") made the__qlt_24xx_handle_abts() function return early iftcm_qla2xxx_find_cmd_by_tag() didn't find a command, but it missed to cleanup the allocated memory for the management command.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
